header.title: QR Code Generator
header.subtitle: Create custom QR codes for websites, text, contacts, and more

placeholders.text: Enter any text you want to encode

preview.title: Preview
preview.emptyState: Enter content to generate QR code

errors.enterContent: Please enter content to generate QR code

features.title: Why Use Our QR Code Generator?

private.title: 100% Private & Secure
private.description: All QR codes are generated locally in your browser. Your data never leaves your device and is not stored on any server.

customizable.title: Fully Customizable
customizable.description: Customize colors, size, error correction level, and download in multiple formats (PNG, SVG, JPEG).

multipleTypes.title: Multiple QR Types
multipleTypes.description: Create QR codes for URLs, text, emails, phone numbers, WiFi credentials, and more.

downloadShare.title: Download & Share
downloadShare.description: Download high-quality QR codes or copy to clipboard instantly. Perfect for print and digital use.

history.title: History Tracking
history.description: Recent QR codes are saved locally so you can quickly regenerate or modify previous codes.

free.title: 100% Free Forever
free.description: No watermarks, no limits, completely free. Generate unlimited QR codes with all features.
